mapper.insert:
insert into place( id, name, seat_count, concert_hall_count, tel, url, addr, lat, lng ) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{seats_count}, #{concert_hall_count}, #{tel}, #{url}, #{addr},
#{lat}, #{lng})

insert into showdb( id, name,
startdate, enddate, place_name,
performer, producer, open_time, runtime,
minimum_age, production_company_name, price, mainposter, introduction_txt,
genre, state, openrun,
introduction_image1, introduction_image2, introduction_image3, introduction_image4 ) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{place_name}, #{performer}, #{producer}, #{open_time}, #{runtime}, #{minimum_age}, #{statistics_search_by_production_company_name}, #{price}, #{mainposter}, #{introduction_txt}, #{genre}, #{state}, #{openrun}, #{introduction_image1}, #{introduction_image2}, #{introduction_image3}, #{introduction_image4} )
insert into popular( showdb_id, showRank) values ( #{id}, #{showRank})
insert into popularW( showdb_id, showRank) values ( #{id}, #{showRank})
insert into popularM( showdb_id, showRank) values ( #{id}, #{showRank})
